tool_description: Get current air quality data for any region. See more info at See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/airquality.
name: Air Quality by API-Ninjas
title: Air Quality by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/airquality
api_list.description: API Ninjas Air Quality API endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: lon
optional_parameters.description: Longitude of desired location. If used, the **lat** parameter must also be supplied.

optional_parameters.name: lat
optional_parameters.description: Latitude of desired location. If used, the **lon** parameter must also be supplied.
